variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a change of glutamine to a stop codon at position 276.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression for the variant NM_000546.6:c.827C>T was undetectable compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett's multiple comparison test was used to compare the means of the variants and wild-type.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than or equal to 80% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% compared to wild-type, or undetectable.
